title: Account Issues

embed.description: Album with topic of No Topic uploaded by sundoae3. Someone help me please

body: So over the course of about a month I've been experiencing some weird stuff with my account. Whenever I would get up from my laptop and leave my account signed in I would come back to see a notification telling me that my account had been signed in elsewhere and that I need to sign in again to access it. I never really found anything wrong with it because nothing would happen. I would still have all my ip and rp and no games that I hadn't played would show up in my history so I thought nothing of it. But today the same issue happened again and when I logged in again it said I was in a game and when I would try to reconnect it would give me a notification telling me that my client had crashed and that I should disconnect and try again. This obviously struck me as weird but I took a look at my friends list and noticed a new player that I've literally never seen before. I don't tend to add people unless I know them personally and it didn't appear to be any friend that just changed their name because I would be able to tell. I just wanna know what's up with this so I can solve the issue and just enjoy my account again. I've sunk a lot of money on this account and I would hate to have to start over

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like someone else is accessing your account. I strongly recommend changing both your password for your League account as well as the email associated with your account. Additionally, for extra security, you can enable 2-step verification if your email provider offers it.

The links *Hyperion3182* provided are some good steps to take as well. Let me know if you have any other questions.

Hello, that's very bad sign, it means someone else is accessing your account, someone else knows your username and password. First of all, if you share your account with someone, just don't do it ever again. That being said, change your password immediately and verify your email:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751744-Email-Verification-FAQ
